column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " We 'll split up to cover more area .
#Text=Because you think I ca n't put up posters on my own ?!
#Text=It 's upside - down , is n't it ?
#Text=I 'll just go with Sokka .
#Text=" Jet says : " Katara ?
#Text=" Jet says : " I think I can help you .
#Text=Katara , I 've changed !
#Text=" Katara says : " Tell it to some other girl , Jet !
#Text=" Jet says : " I do n't want to fight you , I 'm here to help !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Katara , what is it ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Jet 's back .
#Text=We ca n't trust anything Jet says .
#Text=" Sokka says : " But we do n't even know why he 's here !
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't care why he 's here , whatever the reason is , it ca n't be good !
#Text=" Jet says : " I 'm here to help you find Appa !
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , we have to give him a chance .
#Text=" Jet says : " I swear , I 've changed !
#Text=I was a troubled person and I let my anger get out of control , but I do n't even have the gang now !
#Text=I 've put all that behind me !
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're lying !
#Text=" Toph says : " He 's not lying .
#Text=" Sokka says : " How can you tell ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I can feel his breathing and heartbeat .
#Text=When people lie , there 's a physical reaction .
#Text=He 's telling the truth .
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , we do n't have any leads .
#Text=If Jet says he can take us to Appa , we have to check it out .
#Text=" Katara says : " All right .
#Text=But we 're not letting you out of our sight .
#Text=" Jet says : " This is the place I heard about .
#Text=" Aang says : " There 's nothing here .
#Text=" Katara says : " If this is a trap – " Jet says : " I told you , I work nearby !
#Text=Two guys were talking about some giant furry creature they had , I figured it must be Appa !
#Text=" Toph says : " He was here !
#Text=" Aang says : " We missed him .
#Text=" Old Sweepy says : " They took that big thing yesterday .
#Text=Shipped him out to some island .
#Text=About time , I 've been cleaning up fur , and various , uhhh ... leavings all day .
#Text=" Aang says : " What island ?
#Text=Where 's Appa ?
#Text=" Old Sweepy says : " Foreman said some rich royal type on Whaletail Island bought him up .
#Text=Guess for a zoo or such .
#Text=Though , could be the meat that 'd be good .
#Text=" Aang says : " We 've got to get to Whaletail Island !
#Text=Where 's Whaletail Island ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Far , very far .
#Text=Here it is .
#Text=It 's near the South Pole , almost all the way back home .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , it will take us weeks just to get to the tip of the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=And then we 'll need to find a boat to get to the island .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't care .
#Text=We have a chance to find Appa !
#Text=We have to try !
#Text=" Old Sweepy says : " Must be nice to visit an island .
#Text=I have n't had a vacation for years .
#Text=" Katara says : " Do n't you have some more hair to clean up ?
#Text=" Old Sweepy says : " Shuffle on , I get you .
#Text=No more need for Old Sweepy ... " Katara says : " You 're right Aang , right now our first concern has to be finding Appa .
#Text=We can come back when we have him .
#Text=" Sokka says : " All right , let 's get moving .
#Text=" Jet says : " I 'll come with you .
#Text=" Katara says : " We do n't need your help !
#Text=" Jet says : " Why wo n't you trust me ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Gee , I wonder .
#Text=" Toph says : " Was this guy your boyfriend or something ?
#Text=" Katara says : " What ... no !
#Text=" Toph says : " I can tell you 're lying ... " Sokka says : " We can take the train out to the wall but then we 'll have to walk .
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't worry , on the way back we 'll be flying !
#Text=" Toph says : " We 're finally leaving Ba Sing Se .
#Text=Worst ... city ... ever !
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " Jet !
#Text=" Katara says : " I thought you said you did n't have your " gang " anymore !
#Text=" Jet says : " I do n't !
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " We were so worried .
#Text=How did you get away from the Dai Li ?
#Text=" Katara says : " The Dai Li ?!
#Text=" Jet says : " I do n't know what she 's talking about !
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " He got arrested by the Dai Li a couple of weeks ago .
#Text=We saw them drag him away !
#Text=" Jet says : " Why would I be arrested ?
#Text=I 've been living peacefully in the city !
#Text=" Toph says : " This does n't make any sense .
#Text=They 're both telling the truth .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's impossible .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No it 's not !
#Text=Toph ca n't tell who 's lying because they both think they 're telling the truth .
#Text=Jet 's been brainwashed !
#Text=" Jet says : " That 's crazy !
#Text=It ca n't be !
#Text=Stay away from me !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Out of my way , skinny !
#Text=" Dai Li agent says : " Huh ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " If you do n't want to end up like him , you 'll do what I say .
#Text=" Katara says : " The Dai Li must have sent Jet to mislead us , and that janitor was part of their plot , too !
#Text=" Aang says : " I bet they have Appa here in the city .
#Text=Maybe he 's in the same place they took Jet !
#Text=Where did they take you ?
#Text=" Jet says : " Nowhere !
#Text=I - I do n't know what you 're talking about !
#Text=" Aang says : " We need to find a way to jog his real memories .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Maybe Katara should kiss him .
#Text=That should bring something back !
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe you should kiss him , Sokka !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , just an idea !
#Text=" Aang says : " A bad one .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ooh , wait !
#Text=I 've got it !
#Text=" Jet says : " I do n't think it 's working .
#Text=" Toph says : " Try to think of something from your past that triggers your emotions .
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " The Fire Nation !
#Text=Remember what they did to your family !
#Text=" Katara says : " Close your eyes .
#Text=Picture it .
#Text=" Jet says : " No !
#Text=It 's too painful !
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe this will help .
#Text=" Jet says : " They took me to a headquarters under the water .
#Text=Like a lake !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wait !
#Text=Remember what Joo Dee said ?
#Text=She said she went on vacation to Lake Laogai !
#Text=" Jet says : " That 's it !
#Text=Lake Laogai .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So where 's this secret headquarters ?
#Text=" Jet says : " Under the water , I think .
#Text=" Toph says : " There 's a tunnel right there by the shore .
#Text=" Jet says : " It 's all starting to come back to me !
#Text=" Brainwasher says : " I 'm Joo Dee .
#Text=Welcome to Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Joo Dees says : " I 'm Joo Dee .
#Text=Welcome to Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Brainwasher says : " We 're so lucky to have our walls to create order .
#Text=" Joo Dees says : " We 're so lucky to have our walls to create order .
#Text=" Jet says : " I think there might be a cell big enough to hold Appa up ahead .
#Text=I think it 's through here !
#Text="
